A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is the most disrespectful film concerning its characters that I have every scene.  The opening scene shows the rebel Poe taunting a First order command ship.  He would have been blown away immediately if this had been Governor Tarkin.However\, it becomes a farce telephone joke.  Luke\, Yoda\, Leia are all treated in a very poor way.  Kathleen Kennedy should be ashamed herself the way she is dismantling this franchise.  It is becoming \"Transformers\" with shoddy story telling and no regard for what went before.  A disappointment. A disgrace.
